criticalDeadlines.title: Gilbert Quiñones Coordination Call
criticalDeadlines.notes: Confirm meet & confer availability with Kirk Kolodji. Review support calculations and settlement authority parameters.

criticalDeadlines.title: Meet & Confer with Kirk Kolodji
criticalDeadlines.notes: Motion for Reconsideration, §217 Hearing, HIPAA/DCFS Issues. CONDITIONAL on Gilbert Quiñones availability by phone. Evidence Code §1152 confidential settlement context.

criticalDeadlines.title: Exhibit Exchange Deadline (Freddy's Exhibits 1-4)
criticalDeadlines.notes: Email, messenger, or mail delivery to Kirk Kolodji. Ensure proper authentication foundation prepared.

criticalDeadlines.title: Reply to FC §271 Notice
criticalDeadlines.notes: Attorney fees defense ($14,473.64 demand). Document good faith cooperation efforts and Kirk's conditional obstruction pattern.

criticalDeadlines.title: Motion for Reconsideration Strategy Decision
criticalDeadlines.notes: Decision point: Proceed with supplemental filing (corrected) / Withdraw (strategic retreat) / Pivot to appeal. Consider $20K-30K+ fee exposure if proceeding.

strategicOptions.reason: Too much risk for low reward. Case already dismissed.
Pragmatic if case truly dismissed. Avoids $20K+ fee exposure.
Best balance of risk/reward. Contains fee exposure while maintaining professional relationship.

strategicOptions.reason: Requires appellate specialist review. Expensive and time-consuming.
